Row.Text: Our people are divided over the great issue of our day. How do expand without disturbing the balance of power? We must compromise to keep our people happy... [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Kentucky [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be in the Rennaissance Era or later [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Cul} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Two settlers appear
We have maintained equal power... [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Two settlers appear

Our people love their horses, and love racing them, too... [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Kentucky [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be in the Industrial Era or later [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Race Course is built in the capital (+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] and +2 [ICON_TOURISM]) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Golden Age begins
We have formed the Kentucky Derby... [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Race Course is built in the capital [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Golden Age begins
